description:
Kiyo and company stand unable to move while they face Demolt, the last of the Supreme Mamodo. Laila, who has cast off Zofis’ control, teams up with Kiyo and the others, she notices that there’s a change in Demolt’s attacks. He was infamous for only being
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Monster Demoruto! The Hair-Raising Roar
野獣デモルト! 戦慄の雄叫び
